comments.body: Fixed in 5.5.x and will be included in 5.5.36 onwards.

description:
Installed Tomcat 5.5.35 with windows installer,
using a non-default install path of C:\Tomcat

This resulted in 
-Djava.endorsed.dirs=C:\Tomcat\endorsed
instead of 
-Djava.endorsed.dirs=C:\Tomcat\common\endorsed
summary: Installer sets endorsed dirs with /common/ missing from path
